data.title: Smith College
data.meta_description: Explore Smith College reviews, rankings, and statistics. Is it the right college for you?
data.text:
✅Generous financial aid: We meet 100% of demonstrated financial need for all students, with no loans in our aid packages.

✅Open curriculum: With no core or distribution requirements, you'll have the freedom to explore what interests you and combine your passions without limitations.

✅Unique housing system: Our 41 self-governed houses bring community, tradition, and mentorship together to foster belonging at Smith.

✅Guaranteed Internship Funding: Experience matters, and at Smith we’ll give you a stipend of up to $4,500 through our Praxis program to take advantage of any internship opportunity that excites you.

✅Five College Consortium: Our partnership in the Five College Consortium gives you access to over 7,000 courses, additional clubs, libraries and special collections, and more.
